input: Submit a batch request to create a new lock request and retrieve existing lock requests for a specific business event.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankCustomerLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"PartyIdentifyingElements":{"PartyID":"310867"},"EventCode":"103000","UserStatusCode":"1","ValidityStartDate":"2023-10-17","ValidityEndDate":"2023-12-31"}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequests?$filter=EventCode eq '103000' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
